items.title: Notre Dame Football Recruiting: 4-Star California Safety Khalil Terry commits to the Irish
items.summary: On Wednesday, Notre Dame got a big jolt to its 2027 football recruiting class when 4-Star safety Khalil Terry gave his public commitment to Marcus Freeman and the Fighting Irish. The 6’0 185 pounder from Tustin High School in Tustin, California, chose the Irish over a large number of offers including the Tennessee Volunteers, USC […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Another fake rival on deck for Notre Dame
items.summary: Brendan and Jude are on the pod ship to deliver all sorts of gifts. This week the boys break down Notre Dame’s win over Navy, Preview Pitt, discuss the college football playoff rankings, unveil the latest OFD Top 20, and provide their game picks for Notre Dame VS Pitt and other games from all over […]

items.title: Notre Dame goes over another hill for #9 College Football Playoff ranking
items.summary: On Tuesday the College Football Playoff committee released its latest set of rankings on ESPN, and the Notre Dame Fighting Irish moved up one spot to #9. Notre Dame’s climb into the top ten has been remarkable. There was a far distant mountain laid down in front of the Irish to make the college football […]

items.title: When, where, and how to watch #9 Notre Dame VS #23 Pitt
items.summary: Notre Dame VS Pitt is going to be a ranked matchup, and ESPN selected the game as its College Gameday destination. As a Notre Dame fan, I think people expect me to be glad about this — but I think it’s an abomination. This is “college football” after all, and yet we are all forced […]

items.title: WEATHER REPORT: Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Pitt Panthers
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are right in the thick of the hunt for a college football playoff berth with three games remaining on its regular season schedule. At 7-2 and ranked #9 in the AP Poll, it certainly looks like the path to the playoff, and even to host a playoff game, all relies […]

items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football Schedule, TV Times, Stat Leaders, Roster, and Results
items.summary: The Notre Dame football season is in the stretch run — and we’re all eager to see how the regular season finishes with three games left. Despite the loss in Miami, and against Texas A&M, the Irish still have a chance to bring home its 23rd national championship thanks to doing what they did last […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 11 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]
